name: Wave force
description:
A game created for the first Even weekend game jam.

The theme was `Mechanical Theme: Music/Rhythm Based Gameplay` so we decided to do a game similar to asteroids but where the music change some aspects of the game, like enemies movement speed, and their attack timing.  

3rd party assets

The following 3rd party assets were used:

Volumetric line

HACKED font

This glitch texture I found

Also this wireframe image for the menu

unityglitch
